name: Vero Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Vero Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Vero API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Vero API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: user
available_options: User (值: user) - Create, update and manage the subscription status of your users
Event (值: event) - Track events based on actions your customers take in real time

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: track
available_options: Track (值: track) - Track an event for a specific customer

id.name: id
id.description: The unique identifier of the customer
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: ID | 作用: The unique identifier of the customer | (必填项)

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: email (值: None) - The table to create the row in

dataAttributesUi.name: dataAttributesUi
dataAttributesUi.description: Key value pairs that represent any properties you want to track with this event
dataAttributesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data | 作用: Key value pairs that represent any properties you want to track with this event | 默认值: {}

dataAttributesJson.name: dataAttributesJson
dataAttributesJson.description: Key value pairs that represent the custom user properties you want to update
dataAttributesJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data | 作用: Key value pairs that represent the custom user properties you want to update

newId.name: newId
newId.description: The new unique identifier of the user
newId.natural_language_description: 参数名: New ID | 作用: The new unique identifier of the user | (必填项)

tags.name: tags
tags.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tags | 作用: Tags to remove separated by "," | (必填项)

eventName.name: eventName
eventName.description: The name of the event tracked
eventName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event Name | 作用: The name of the event tracked | (必填项)

extraAttributesUi.name: extraAttributesUi
extraAttributesUi.description: Key value pairs that represent reserved, Vero-specific operators. Refer to the note on “deduplication” below.
extraAttributesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Extra | 作用: Key value pairs that represent reserved, Vero-specific operators. Refer to the note on “deduplication” below. | 默认值: {}

extraAttributesJson.name: extraAttributesJson
extraAttributesJson.description: Key value pairs that represent reserved, Vero-specific operators. Refer to the note on “deduplication” below.
extraAttributesJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Extra | 作用: Key value pairs that represent reserved, Vero-specific operators. Refer to the note on “deduplication” below.
